text.data: [character][0x1]!! Come here![end]
Nope![end]
The Desert Land of Dafila[end1]
Matelite: [character][0x1] will feel a lot better when she hears we defeated Sauzer's men!![end]

Taicho: We have defeated General Palpaleos...
So this is what war is like...[end]
Matelite: [character][0x1]... You take care of the info about the Holy Dragons! We're going back to [character][0x1]!![end]
Capture the king! You can take care of it, the responsibility is yours![end]
Suspicious Man: Are you popular...?[end]
Yeah, I am. I dunno, lately...[end1]
I see... you sure don't look like it.[end]

Even you can become popular overnight! We're searching for members for the Freedom Revolutionaries! The password is...
[0x24]Starting today, I will be cool!![0x22][end]

Rush: Oh... I wonder if [character][0x1] is feeling well...
It would probably be better if we were by her side instead of Matelite.[end]
Rush: A revolution for freedom! This is great![end]
Truce: I haven't heard any real information about Dafila. Nobody in the Resistance is from here...[end]
Truce: I got a map of the Holy Dragon's temple from the palace of Dafila. It seems the temple of Jormungand is at the very southern end of the desert. But never mind that, get the King!![end]
Truce: A revolution... I'm worried.[end]

Bikkebakke: Sweets of the desert...
I bet they're desserts, huh?![end]

I lost something very important... Even if I looked for it I wouldn't find it...
You wouldn't understand...[end]

Wait, [character][0x1]!!
Donfan: Hello, miss! O, beautiful girl of the desert! I shall fill this desert with your lovely tears![end]
Ugh... I wonder if he's a member of some exploration party?[end]
Battlefield Salesman: Oh we married too soon... My wife... going from someone like that to someone like this...[end]
Ssshh!! What's the password?[end]
The revolution's the wind of change. Starting today, I'll be really cool too![end1]
Okay! Enter![end]
Your orders are to capture the king in the square! This is an important responsibility![end]
Drat![end]

Libero: King! Be prepared! Tomorrow Dafila shall be ours! The Freedom Revolution will be realized! The leader shall be... [character][0x1]!
I hereby declare Dafila a free kingdom! A new era begins![end]

I must flee...
Farewell, my citizens...[end]
The desert night how deep it is... The endless banquet continues...[end]
Rush became an adult![end]
Truce became an adult![end]
Bikkebakke was already an adult!![end]
As for [character][0x1]...[end]
Leave at once![end]
The King cometh![end]
Stand aside! You bar my path![end]
Many thanks! I shall now partake in sleep![end]

Completely ecstatic am I! With so numerous a lady in my palace!
Doing such and so... Whew, so busy am I...[end]
Donfan: 'Tis I, Donfan! Member of the Resistance! I would like to ask you to take a short break tonight...[end]
Read Don't read[end1]

Dragon Squad Captain [character][0x1]!! Married to Princess [character][0x1]!!
Or not?[end]

Donfan: Such is the way of the world...
You have lost something. That's how these things are. I do not know what, however, I wish to. Your heart is dry like this desert... But look, a mirage. The oasis of Donfan awaits you. Well, I, Donfan, leader of the Resistance, shall escort you home. Where do you live?[end]

Donfan: Well? I would also like you to let me in... How does this much sound? Such is the way of the world...
[character][0x1] has my wallet. How about giving the bill to him?[end]
Man! It's so hot today! How about reading some news about the Resistance? 100 Piro per copy![end]
[character][0x1] Crew Member Steals Bikkebakke's Mushrooms and Wallet, Escapes![end]
Ectarina Rejected Again!! Is it the Uniuji She Keeps Sending?![end]
Gunso's Scratching Disease Worsens! Does [character][0x1] Have It Too?! Oh, the horror![end]
All sold out! The popular Taicho novels have sold out too![end]
Zeroshin: Mom... It looks like I'll finish this job just fine...[end]
Sajin: The king is fast! Are you watching closely?[end]
You got 20 Uniujis.[end]
You got a Mach Vest.[end]
You found 5 High Magic Gins.[end]

You got a Dark Force.
There was also a note inside!
Dark Force: F[0x2a][0x26][0x23] you, Square!!!![end]
You got a Master Rod.[end]
The civilization of this land was cultivated through a very lengthy history... [0x2a]blah blah[0x2a] Do you not know of our historical traditions?! Ignorant fools such as you may not enter![end]
[0x2a]wheeze[0x2a] Oh mercy... I am busier than three people put together...[end]

Having you come in is not something I would quite appreciate.
At any rate, congratulations on the liberation of Dafila...
Oh yes, here is a present for freeing us...[end]
Inside you found... 10 Long Swords!![end]
Oh no!! I have no more! Please forgive me![end][end]
